inclusion.criterion: Adult patients above the age of 18 years subjected to cardiac surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acceptance to perform the study protocol and participate throughout the whole trial period
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who refuse to participate or who /can not sign informed consent
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and has been on insulin since diagnosis. He reports previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but is currently experiencing hyperglycemia without symptoms.
